data.text: @James_and_Casey Great idea! We also serve bibim noodles, Gondreabap, assorted mushroom with rice and stir fried spicy octopus with rice. Hopefully we will have more choices in the future!

Korean Air serves a wide variety of in-flight meals. The most popular one must be bibimbap! Customers can even add Korean hot pepper paste and sesame oil at your preference. 

Let’s enjoy the traditional Korean cuisine at 10,000 feet high!

#KoreanAir #Korea https://t.co/vBamX23Gr5

Can airplane go in reverse? Tell us!

#KoreanAir #Korea #Airplane #Aircraft https://t.co/UJskuwoacS

The beauty of the #hanbok is undeniable, even inside the cabin. 
Take a look at this Korean Air TV advertisement broadcasted in 1989, which is full of remembrance of the precious good old days!

#KoreanAir #Korea #ThrowBack https://t.co/xR9fKMe9vM
